author: Laura Hoy
title: Donald Trump to Face a Showdown as U.S. Lawmakers Mobilize Against Him
description: Donald Trump's tantrum during a coronavirus press briefing highlighted the growing tension between local officials and the Federal Government. Trump seems to be looking for a fight as governors stand their ground. The post Donald Trump to Face a Showdown as U…
content:
• Donald Trump claims he can force local lawmakers to lift their stay-at-home orders whether they want to or not.
  • His tirade during a Monday press briefing continued to deepen the political divide in America.
